pages.text: You already noticed that you deal significantly more damage to enemies if you jump while attacking.$(br)To further improve those jump attacks, you have developed this enchantment, which increases the additional damage even more.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Additional damage when dealing crits.$(br2)Max Level: 2$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Sharpness.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Improved Critical by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Improved Critical from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and experience for each additional level.
